channel.title: Hyperion : how to set it up on Netbeans IDE
channel.description:
Does anybody know how to set up the Hyperion on Netbeans? i've tried several times , keep failing xD
i'm also talking about the original Hyperion source , not any developped versions....
EDIT : ok i've got the compile working and i can run the server perfectly.
